headerSubtitle: Add someone to a care team.
warningOwnedProfilesTitle: You can only invite team members for profiles you own.
warningOwnedProfilesBody: You must be the Care Owner of at least one profile to send invitations.
giveAccessAll: Grant access to all {{count}} {{profiles}} you care for
specializationPlaceholder: e.g., Speech Therapy, Occupational Therapy, ABA
personalMessageHelper: This message will be included in the invitation email
errorNoProfileSelected: Please select at least one profile to invite for.
sendFailed: Failed to send invitation. Please try again.

caregiver.single: Hi! I'd love for you to help track {{name}}'s daily progress in our CaptureEase app. You'll be able to log daily activities, behaviors, and milestones that help us understand {{name}} better. Looking forward to working together!
caregiver.multi: Hi! I'd love for you to help track daily progress for {{names}} in our CaptureEase app. You'll be able to log daily activities, behaviors, and milestones that help us understand progress better. Looking forward to working together!

therapist.single: Hi! I'd like to invite you to view {{name}}'s progress in our CaptureEase app. You'll have access to timeline data, analytics, and progress tracking that might be helpful for our sessions. Thanks for being part of the care team!
therapist.multi: Hi! I'd like to invite you to view progress for {{names}} in our CaptureEase app. You'll have access to timeline data, analytics, and progress tracking that might be helpful for your sessions. Thanks for being part of the care team!
